original: @303b # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @303b # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: k'a t+ya ka ra na bh'a ba siddhi /
analyzed: k'a t+ya ka ra na bh'a ba siddhi /
translated: Kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhi

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Establishment of the Nature of Cause and Effect

original: 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.🔽The establishment of cause and effect

original: mngon sum dang ni mi dmigs pa'i //🔽dbye ba gsum gyis yang dag 'grub //
analyzed: mngon sum dang ni mi dmigs pa'i // dbye ba gsum gyis yang dag 'grub //
translated: is by direct perception and non-apprehension.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni //
translated: The nature of cause and effect

original: kha cig rnam pa lnga yis smra //
analyzed: kha cig rnam pa lnga yis smra //
translated: some say is by five aspects.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis grub pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'o zhes bya bar rigs so //🔽de la spyi la mngon du zhugs pa mi dmigs pa'i grogs dang ldan pa yul gnyis pa rim pas byung ba'i mngon sum gnyis sam /
analyzed: mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis grub pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'o zhes bya bar rigs so // de la spyi la mngon du zhugs pa mi dmigs pa'i grogs dang ldan pa yul gnyis pa rim pas byung ba'i mngon sum gnyis sam /
translated: It is reasonable that cause and effect are established by direct perception and non-apprehension.

original: yang na gnyi ga'i spyi 'dzin pa mngon sum gyi grogs dang ldan pa rim pas byung ba'i mi dmigs pa gnyis zhes bya ste /
analyzed: yang na gnyi ga'i spyi 'dzin pa mngon sum gyi grogs dang ldan pa rim pas byung ba'i mi dmigs pa gnyis zhes bya ste /
translated: Therein, the direct perception of the general, accompanied by the non-apprehension of the companion, is the direct perception of the two objects arising in sequence, or else, the non-apprehension of the two universals, accompanied by the direct perception, arising in sequence.

original: dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis grub pa yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: dbye ba rnam pa gsum gyis grub pa yin no zhes kha cig zer ro //
translated: Some say: It is established by the three types of investigation.

original: yang gzhan dag ni de gsum dang tha ma gnyis kyi grogs dang ldan pa nyid de dbye ba rnam pa lnga'i rim pas nges pa yin no zhes smra ste /
analyzed: yang gzhan dag ni de gsum dang tha ma gnyis kyi grogs dang ldan pa nyid de dbye ba rnam pa lnga'i rim pas nges pa yin no zhes smra ste /
translated: Others say: It is established by the sequence of five types of investigation, which are the three types of investigation and the last two in combination.

original: dang po gsum yod du zin kyang rtogs par byed pa po'i blo the tshom nye bar skye bas tha ma gnyis yod na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang po gsum yod du zin kyang rtogs par byed pa po'i blo the tshom nye bar skye bas tha ma gnyis yod na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if the first three exist, if the last two exist, the characteristics of positive and negative concomitance and so on and the nature of cause and effect are established because the mind of the one who realizes them generates doubt.

original: de la mngon sum gyis ni rjes su 'gro ba rtogs la /
analyzed: de la mngon sum gyis ni rjes su 'gro ba rtogs la /
translated: Direct perception comprehends positive concomitance.

original: gnyis kyis ni ldog pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gnyis kyis ni ldog pa zhes bya ste /
translated: The other two comprehend negative concomitance.

original: lngas nges par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: lngas nges par grub pa yin no //
translated: It is established by five.

original: de dag las gcig las gcig gis ma des na the tshom spong par dka'i zhes bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag las gcig las gcig gis ma des na the tshom spong par dka'i zhes bsams pa yin no //
translated: Since it is difficult to eliminate doubt by one of them, it is thought that they are mutually dependent.

original: 'di spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di spyad par bya ste /
translated: This should be investigated.

original: gal te snga ma'i mi dmigs pas //
analyzed: gal te snga ma'i mi dmigs pas //
translated: If the former is not observed,

original: gzhan dang brel pa la sogs //
analyzed: gzhan dang brel pa la sogs //
translated: and the absence of other, haste, etc.

original: gcod pa med na de ci zhig //
analyzed: gcod pa med na de ci zhig //
translated: If there is no cutting off, what is it?

original: gcod na phi mas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: gcod na phi mas ci zhig bya //
translated: If there is cutting off, what is the use of the other?

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: mi dmigs pa gnyis po gang yin pas ldog pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa 'di nyid don du gnyer ba yin na de la yang rgyur mngon par 'dod pa med na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa gnyis po gang yin pas ldog pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa 'di nyid don du gnyer ba yin na de la yang rgyur mngon par 'dod pa med na /
translated: If one seeks this very non-apprehension in order to establish the exclusion by the two kinds of non-apprehension, and if there is no desire for a cause,

original: 'bras bu gnyis mngon par 'dod pa yod pa gnod pa 'dis bsgrub par bya'i //
analyzed: 'bras bu gnyis mngon par 'dod pa yod pa gnod pa 'dis bsgrub par bya'i //
translated: then this fault should be established for one who desires the two results.

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Moreover, it is threefold:

original: yul de nyid na gnas pa'am //
analyzed: yul de nyid na gnas pa'am //
translated: either it abides in that very object,

original: yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'am //
analyzed: yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'am //
translated: or it comes from another object,

original: tshogs pas dben pa can de dag la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pas dben pa can de dag la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
translated: or it arises from those that are devoid of the assemblage, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i bye grag gi gnod pa dang bral ba'i rgyu mtshan ma yin na 'di la ci zhig ltos //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bye grag gi gnod pa dang bral ba'i rgyu mtshan ma yin na 'di la ci zhig ltos //
translated: If the reason is free from such faults of the example, what is there to look at here?

original: ldog pa la 'di dgos pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rjes su 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i @304a * //
analyzed: ldog pa la 'di dgos pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang rjes su 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i @304a * //
translated: This is not necessary for the exclusion, but rather for apprehending the positive concomitance.

original: mngon sum la grogs byed pa nye bar bstan pa yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: mngon sum la grogs byed pa nye bar bstan pa yin no zhes zer na /
translated: The meaning of the statement is that non-apprehension assists perception.

original: 'di yod pas na 'di byung ba //
analyzed: 'di yod pas na 'di byung ba //
translated: If it exists, then this exists.

original: mngon sum gyis rtogs min nam ci //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis rtogs min nam ci // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Is this not understood by perception?🔽If it exists, then this exists.

original: yod na yod pa las gzhan gyis rjes su 'gro ba ni med do //
analyzed: yod na yod pa las gzhan gyis rjes su 'gro ba ni med do //
translated: There is no other concomitance than that.

original: de yang mngon sum gyis grub ste /
analyzed: de yang mngon sum gyis grub ste /
translated: And that is established by perception.

original: 'dir mi dmigs pa'i grogs kyis ci zhig bya /🔽'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba ci 'dra ba 'di 'dra ba /
analyzed: 'dir mi dmigs pa'i grogs kyis ci zhig bya / 'di ltar rjes su 'gro ba ci 'dra ba 'di 'dra ba /
translated: What is the use of non-apprehension as an assistant here?🔽In this way, is there not a concomitance like this?

original: nye bar thob par yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: nye bar thob par yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: It is not obtained.

original: mngon sum tsam gyis yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum tsam gyis yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because mere perception does not exist.

original: snga na med pa gzung ba khyad par can gyi mngon sum gyis de 'dzin te mi 'dod par thal ba med do //
analyzed: snga na med pa gzung ba khyad par can gyi mngon sum gyis de 'dzin te mi 'dod par thal ba med do //
translated: The apprehension of a special object that did not exist before is not accepted as being apprehended by perception.

original: de ltar dbye ba gsum las tha dad pa'i dngos po bzlog pa'i ngo bo snga na med pa mi dmigs pas 'grub bam //
analyzed: de ltar dbye ba gsum las tha dad pa'i dngos po bzlog pa'i ngo bo snga na med pa mi dmigs pas 'grub bam //
translated: In this way, is the nature of the negation of a different entity from the three divisions established by non-apprehension of what did not exist before?

original: med pa tsam yin /
analyzed: med pa tsam yin /
translated: Or is it mere non-existence?

original: phyogs dang po yin na 'di ltar 'gyur te 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: phyogs dang po yin na 'di ltar 'gyur te 'di yod pas na 'di 'byung ba yin te /
translated: Because this exists, that arises.

original: gzhan las 'byung ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan las 'byung ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because there is no arising from another.

original: ldog pa de nyid kho na ste /🔽de na mi gnas gzhan las ni //
analyzed: ldog pa de nyid kho na ste / de na mi gnas gzhan las ni //
translated: The negation is just that.

original: skyes min gzhan las 'ongs pa min //
analyzed: skyes min gzhan las 'ongs pa min //
translated: Because it does not endure in that, and because it does not arise from another.🔽Because it does not come from another.

original: gang zhig yod las 'bras 'byung ba //
analyzed: gang zhig yod las 'bras 'byung ba //
translated: If this exists, the effect arises.

original: gal te des min 'ga' las min //
analyzed: gal te des min 'ga' las min //
translated: If it does not arise from that, it does not arise from anything else.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: de yang mi dmigs pa sngon du song ba'i mngon sum gyis grub ste /
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa sngon du song ba'i mngon sum gyis grub ste /
translated: Moreover, it is established by direct perception preceded by nonapprehension.

original: phi ma gnyis kyis cung zad kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: phi ma gnyis kyis cung zad kyang ma yin no //
translated: The latter two are not even slightly so.

original: de yang rgyu med na 'bras bu de na gnas pa'am ;🔽/ gzhan las skyes pa'am //
analyzed: de yang rgyu med na 'bras bu de na gnas pa'am ; / gzhan las skyes pa'am //
translated: Moreover, if there is no cause, the effect either endures in that or🔽it arises from another.🔽Or it comes from another through the effort of another.

original: gzhan gyis 'bad pas gzhan nas 'ongs pa bkag pa nyid kyis ldog pa bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis 'bad pas gzhan nas 'ongs pa bkag pa nyid kyis ldog pa bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: The negation of these is the establishment of the negation.

original: phyi ma gnyis kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyi ma gnyis kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: The latter two are not so.

original: de dag gis bya ba ma grub na brgyas kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis bya ba ma grub na brgyas kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if their activity is not established, even a hundred of them do not exist.

original: de yang dang po nyid kyis gcig tu grub zin pas gzhan dogs pa med do //
analyzed: de yang dang po nyid kyis gcig tu grub zin pas gzhan dogs pa med do //
translated: Since it is already established as one by the first, there is no doubt about the other.

original: gal te yang dang po'i mi dmigs pas med pa tsam rtogs so snyam du sems na //
analyzed: gal te yang dang po'i mi dmigs pas med pa tsam rtogs so snyam du sems na //
translated: If you think that the non-apprehension of the first realizes mere non-existence,

original: dngos po med tsam rtogs na yang //
analyzed: dngos po med tsam rtogs na yang //
translated: even if the mere absence of an entity is realized,

original: snga ma dogs pa yod ma yin //🔽'di yi bya ba nga mas na //
analyzed: snga ma dogs pa yod ma yin // 'di yi bya ba nga mas na //
translated: there is no doubt about the former.🔽What use is the remainder

original: 'di la lhag mas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: 'di la lhag mas ci zhig bya //
translated: in this, which is done by the first?

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: re zhig med pa tsam rtogs na ;
analyzed: re zhig med pa tsam rtogs na ;
translated: If the mere absence is realized first,

original: / gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro //
analyzed: / gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro //
translated: what would follow from what?

original: 'di med pa zhes bya bas kyang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs na ji ltar 'dod pas nye bar thob pas shin tu thal bar 'gyur bas dogs pa yongs su chad pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di med pa zhes bya bas kyang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs na ji ltar 'dod pas nye bar thob pas shin tu thal bar 'gyur bas dogs pa yongs su chad pa nyid do //
translated: Even if the absence of this is realized, how could the doubt be eliminated by the mere apprehension of what is desired?

original: 'di'i bya ba las snga ma'i dngos po med pa 'di rtogs na gsum pas de nyid rtogs pas lhag mas ci @304b zhig bya /
analyzed: 'di'i bya ba las snga ma'i dngos po med pa 'di rtogs na gsum pas de nyid rtogs pas lhag mas ci @304b zhig bya /
translated: If the absence of the former entity is realized from the action of this, what use is the remainder in realizing that very thing by the third?

original: gang gi phyir tha ma gnyis kyis ma tshang ba med pa thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha ma gnyis kyis ma tshang ba med pa thob pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the last two do not obtain the complete.

original: rjes su 'gro ba 'khrul ba yis //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba 'khrul ba yis //
translated: And the subsequent cognition is mistaken.🔽

original: ldog pa khong du chud ce na /🔽mngon sum tsam gyis bya ba la'ang //
analyzed: ldog pa khong du chud ce na / mngon sum tsam gyis bya ba la'ang //
translated: “If you say that the subsequent cognition is mistaken with regard to the going and the ceasing,

original: 'di la ci yi phyir mi brjod //
analyzed: 'di la ci yi phyir mi brjod //
translated: then why not say the same with regard to the mere direct perception of the action?

original: ces smos te /
analyzed: ces smos te /
translated: ”🔽If you say that the subsequent cognition is mistaken with regard to the going and the ceasing, then why not say the same with regard to the mere direct perception of the action?

original: gang snga ma don du gnyer ba ni rjes su gro ba dang ldog pa dag re re khrul pa nyid kyis lhan cig rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang snga ma don du gnyer ba ni rjes su gro ba dang ldog pa dag re re khrul pa nyid kyis lhan cig rgyu dang 'bras bur bstan pa yin no //
translated: The point is that the prior and subsequent cognitions are taught to be cause and effect because each is mistaken.

original: de bas na re res de'i ngo bo ma yin pa yang yod pa la gnod pa med pa nyid de bdag cag mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na re res de'i ngo bo ma yin pa yang yod pa la gnod pa med pa nyid de bdag cag mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though each is not the nature of the other, it is not the case that their existence is undermined. We are the same.

original: de'i phyir tha ma gnyis yod na yang dang po mi dgos na /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha ma gnyis yod na yang dang po mi dgos na /
translated: Therefore, if the latter two exist, the first is not necessary.

original: dang po yod na tha ma dag dgos pa med do zhes bya bar grub po //
analyzed: dang po yod na tha ma dag dgos pa med do zhes bya bar grub po //
translated: If the first exists, the latter two are not necessary. This is established.

original: ma grub ste gang gi phyir dang po nyid kyis de'i bya ba las sngar de nyid med do zhes rtogs pas kyang bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo la rab tu sbyor bas med do zhes nges par bzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub ste gang gi phyir dang po nyid kyis de'i bya ba las sngar de nyid med do zhes rtogs pas kyang bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo la rab tu sbyor bas med do zhes nges par bzung ba ma yin te /
translated: This is not established. Because it is understood that prior to the action, the first itself does not exist, and because it is applied to the nature of that action, it is not ascertained that it does not exist.

original: phi mas yang nges par gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: phi mas yang nges par gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,

original: dang po'i yang dogs pa med pa de nyid gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po'i yang dogs pa med pa de nyid gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.

original: de tsam med las yang med par //
analyzed: de tsam med las yang med par //
translated: The second one is not necessarily so,

original: phyi mas rnam par nges yin na //
analyzed: phyi mas rnam par nges yin na //
translated: because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,

original: rigs pa de nyid mtshungs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rigs pa de nyid mtshungs pa'i phyir //
translated: because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,

original: snga mas kyang ni cis mi 'dod //🔽ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: snga mas kyang ni cis mi 'dod // ces bya ba smos te /
translated: because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,

original: bya ba de nyid las snga mas med pa zhes bya ba yang gang gi phyir de med pa tsam gyis med par bstan pa yin te ji skad bstan pa'i dbye ba gsum yod pas gsal bar 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba de nyid las snga mas med pa zhes bya ba yang gang gi phyir de med pa tsam gyis med par bstan pa yin te ji skad bstan pa'i dbye ba gsum yod pas gsal bar 'phags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.

original: de lta bas na des ma nges na phyi mas kyang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na des ma nges na phyi mas kyang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,🔽because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one is not necessarily so,

original: de la snga ma gnyis po med pa tsam du gnas pa yin gyi gcig ni ma yin pa'i rigs pa 'di mthong bas phyi ma las yang su zhig yid rton no //
analyzed: de la snga ma gnyis po med pa tsam du gnas pa yin gyi gcig ni ma yin pa'i rigs pa 'di mthong bas phyi ma las yang su zhig yid rton no //
translated: because the first one is not necessarily so.🔽The second one

original: de la rag ma las pas de med par yang 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur bas gnyis pas med pa nyid la 'brel pa med par mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de la rag ma las pas de med par yang 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur bas gnyis pas med pa nyid la 'brel pa med par mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Since it would not depend on that, it would follow that it would occur even when that does not exist. Therefore, the second is similar to the first in that it is not related to nonexistence.

original: gzhan yang me dang snga mo yod pa'i de ma thag tu byung ba'i du ba yang bong bu med pas sngar nyams su myong ngo he brjod mod kyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang me dang snga mo yod pa'i de ma thag tu byung ba'i du ba yang bong bu med pas sngar nyams su myong ngo he brjod mod kyi /
translated: Moreover, smoke that occurs immediately after the existence of fire is previously experienced, even though a donkey does not exist.

original: gnyi ldog pas log pa'am phi mas kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan brgyud pa'i thabs rjes su 'brang ba yin pas //
analyzed: gnyi ldog pas log pa'am phi mas kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni gzhan dang gzhan brgyud pa'i thabs rjes su 'brang ba yin pas //
translated: But if one says, “It is negated by the negation of both,” or “It is negated by the negation of the other,” then the method of following the other and the other is lost.

original: sdar bzhag pa nyams pa yin no //🔽de ltar gnas na gsum ma yin gyi /🔽nyis ni yin no zhes zer na phi ma yang ngon med pa yin mo zhes bya ba de tsam zhig ston gyi de gnyis sam gsum zhes bya @305a * //
analyzed: sdar bzhag pa nyams pa yin no // de ltar gnas na gsum ma yin gyi / nyis ni yin no zhes zer na phi ma yang ngon med pa yin mo zhes bya ba de tsam zhig ston gyi de gnyis sam gsum zhes bya @305a * //
translated: Therefore, the assertion is lost.

original: pas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: pas ci zhig bya //
translated: If one says, “If it exists in that way, it is not three, but two,” then one should say, “The other is also not existent.” One should only teach that much. What is the point of saying “those two” or “three”?

original: gnyis kyis dgos pa yod de gzhan med pas kyang nges par mi rung ngo zhes zer na de lta mos kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig med pas mi dmigs pa yin na de'i cha snga ma nyid kyi nus pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir mi 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis kyis dgos pa yod de gzhan med pas kyang nges par mi rung ngo zhes zer na de lta mos kyi rgyu 'ba' zhig med pas mi dmigs pa yin na de'i cha snga ma nyid kyi nus pa yin no zhes ci'i phyir mi 'dod //
translated: If you say that the two are necessary because the other is not possible, then why do you not accept that if non-apprehension is due to the absence of a cause, it is due to the power of the former?

original: ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not so,

original: thams cad du dogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: thams cad du dogs pa med pa'i phyir zhes bstan zin to //
translated: we have already shown that there is no doubt in all cases.

original: gzhan du na yang mngon gsum yin gyi //
analyzed: gzhan du na yang mngon gsum yin gyi //
translated: And even if it is otherwise, it is direct perception.

original: de gnyis ni ma yin no zhes smra bar nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni ma yin no zhes smra bar nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you can say that the two are not so.

original: gzhan yang sngar smra ba dang gzhung mtshungs pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang sngar smra ba dang gzhung mtshungs pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it is the same as the previous statement, because there is no difference in the text.

original: snga ma'i mi dmigs pa gcig tu 'dod mod kyi /
analyzed: snga ma'i mi dmigs pa gcig tu 'dod mod kyi /
translated: Although the former non-apprehension is accepted as one,

original: de yang me dang bong bu gnyis log pa yod pa dang / de ma thag tu du ba mi dmigs pas ldog pas da ltar yang rnam pa gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de yang me dang bong bu gnyis log pa yod pa dang / de ma thag tu du ba mi dmigs pas ldog pas da ltar yang rnam pa gnyis yin no //
translated: that also has two aspects, because the absence of fire and the absence of a donkey exist, and because the non-apprehension of smoke immediately after that is reversed.

original: dang po med snang rim pas dmigs //
analyzed: dang po med snang rim pas dmigs //
translated: First, the non-existent appears gradually, and is apprehended.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur gnas par shes //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur gnas par shes //
translated: It is known to abide as cause and effect.

original: yang na mthong rim mi dmigs pas //
analyzed: yang na mthong rim mi dmigs pas //
translated: Or else, by the non-apprehension of the order of perception,

original: gzhan du thub pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan du thub pa med par 'gyur //
translated: there would be no other way of knowing.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: the tshom de dang de bdal ba'i phyir phi ma phi ma dang snga ma snga ma dmigs pa dang mi dmigs par tshol bar thal bar 'gyu ro //
analyzed: the tshom de dang de bdal ba'i phyir phi ma phi ma dang snga ma snga ma dmigs pa dang mi dmigs par tshol bar thal bar 'gyu ro //
translated: Because of that doubt, there would be the consequence of searching for the prior and subsequent in terms of apprehension and non-apprehension.🔽There, one should make the other three as one wishes.

original: de la ji ltar 'dod par gsum la sogs par gzhan par gyis shig / mngon sum dbus su gzhag pa'i mi dmigs pa dag gang du yang mi dgos te /
analyzed: de la ji ltar 'dod par gsum la sogs par gzhan par gyis shig / mngon sum dbus su gzhag pa'i mi dmigs pa dag gang du yang mi dgos te /
translated: Non-apprehension, which is posited as direct perception, is not necessary anywhere,

original: gzhan dgos pa yod pas gnyis ka la yid brtan du med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dgos pa yod pas gnyis ka la yid brtan du med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because both are unreliable due to the need for another.

original: de gnyis dpyad na yang gcig nyid kyis 'grub ste /
analyzed: de gnyis dpyad na yang gcig nyid kyis 'grub ste /
translated: When those two are examined, they are established by one.

original: de bas na mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nges te rgyu dang 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so //
analyzed: de bas na mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag gis rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa nges te rgyu dang 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so //
translated: Therefore, by direct perception and non-apprehension, there is ascertainment of concomitance and reversal, just as it is with cause and effect.

original: de gnyis don tha dad pa'i ngo bo de rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis don tha dad pa'i ngo bo de rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those two, which have different meanings, have the same nature.

original: de gnyis kyang rtogs pa'i rim pa nges pa med pas rnam pa gnyis ka yang 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis kyang rtogs pa'i rim pa nges pa med pas rnam pa gnyis ka yang 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And since there is no certainty as to the order in which these two are realized, both forms are established.

original: de lta mod kyi ldog pa bstan pa de ltar rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi ldog pa bstan pa de ltar rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: Nevertheless, the negation is presented in this way, as a matter of fact.

original: de'i phyir de 'dzin pa'i mi dmigs pas rjes su 'gro ba'i yul can mngon sum ldog pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de 'dzin pa'i mi dmigs pas rjes su 'gro ba'i yul can mngon sum ldog pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to negate the existence of the object of the non-perception that apprehends it, by means of the perception that has a similar object.

original: ma yin te med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan ma nyid kyi gzhal bya bstan pa nyid du gzhag pa yin gyi mang pos ni ma yin te tshad ma ltar snang ba rnams la yang mthong ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan ma nyid kyi gzhal bya bstan pa nyid du gzhag pa yin gyi mang pos ni ma yin te tshad ma ltar snang ba rnams la yang mthong ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because the object of comprehension is presented as the mere sign of the invariable relation, not as the many, because there is the perception of the fallacious means of knowledge.

original: snang ba mi dmigs pa gcig nyid kyis de med pa shin tu med par bsgrub pa ni legs pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba mi dmigs pa gcig nyid kyis de med pa shin tu med par bsgrub pa ni legs pa yin te /
translated: It is better to establish the non-existence of that by the non-perception of the mere appearance,

original: lhag @305b par brtsad pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: lhag @305b par brtsad pa 'dis ci zhig bya /
translated: What is the use of this additional effort?

original: de'i tshe du ba'i dri ma tsam yang mi srid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe du ba'i dri ma tsam yang mi srid do //
translated: At that time, even the mere smell of smoke is impossible.

original: du ma ldog pa las gang ldog pa du ba log par gyur to zhes nges par bya ba ma yin nam zhes zer na /
analyzed: du ma ldog pa las gang ldog pa du ba log par gyur to zhes nges par bya ba ma yin nam zhes zer na /
translated: If you say that it is not so, then how can you be certain that the negation of the presence of smoke is the negation of fire?

original: de nyid kyi phyir rjes su 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i mngon sum la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rjes su 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i mngon sum la ltos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the perception that apprehends the positive concomitance must be based on the perception of the negative concomitance.

original: gzhan me dpa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis med pa nyid la gus par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan me dpa'i sbyor ba nyid kyis med pa nyid la gus par mi bya'o //
translated: But the negative concomitance cannot be established by the mere absence of the positive concomitance.🔽In the same way, when the positive concomitance is apprehended, it is possible that there is a plurality of things that are concomitant with the presence of the reason. Therefore, when one wishes to know which of these is the one that exists, one must use a method that establishes the existence of that thing.

original: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba gzung ba sngon du 'gro ba nges pa la yang du ma srid pa dag las gang zhig yod pa'i sbyor bas 'di yod do zhes shes par 'dod pa la mi smig pa las gang zhig med pa'i sbyor bas 'di med pa
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba gzung ba sngon du 'gro ba nges pa la yang du ma srid pa dag las gang zhig yod pa'i sbyor bas 'di yod do zhes shes par 'dod pa la mi smig pa las gang zhig med pa'i sbyor bas 'di med pa
translated: But when one wishes to know which of these is the one that does not exist, one must use a method that establishes the nonexistence of that thing.

original: yin na re zhig de yod pa'i sbyor bas sngar yang 'di yod pas yin no zhes bya bar grub pa de la yang re re nas bzhag pa dang / bsal ba de lta bus rtogs pa nus so //
analyzed: yin na re zhig de yod pa'i sbyor bas sngar yang 'di yod pas yin no zhes bya bar grub pa de la yang re re nas bzhag pa dang / bsal ba de lta bus rtogs pa nus so //
translated: But if you say that the existence of the reason is established by the method that establishes the existence of that thing, then it is established that the reason exists when the thing exists. And in that case, it is possible to understand the negative concomitance by the method that establishes the existence of the reason.

original: de bzhin du yang yod pas snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis ldog pa bsgrub par nus so //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang yod pas snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis ldog pa bsgrub par nus so //
translated: In the same way, it is possible to establish the negative concomitance by the prior and subsequent statements.

original: du ma bsal ba la sogs pa yang gnyis bos kyang mi nus so zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: du ma bsal ba la sogs pa yang gnyis bos kyang mi nus so zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: and the removal of the many, etc., are not possible by the two.

original: lnga po rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang ma khyab pa yin te /
analyzed: lnga po rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang ma khyab pa yin te /
translated: This fivefold arrangement is not all-inclusive.

original: thal ba dang me dang bum pa dang / rdza mkhan la sogs pa rnams la phyi ma med pa'i phyir dang chu'i rgyun 'gag pa la sogs pa la yang snga ma med kyang grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: thal ba dang me dang bum pa dang / rdza mkhan la sogs pa rnams la phyi ma med pa'i phyir dang chu'i rgyun 'gag pa la sogs pa la yang snga ma med kyang grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the last is not present in ashes, fire, pot, potter, etc., and the first is not present in the cessation of the stream of water, etc., but they are established.

original: 'di ltar chu lon gyis 'gags na chu'i rgyun 'gags pa dmigs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar chu lon gyis 'gags na chu'i rgyun 'gags pa dmigs te /
translated: Thus, when the stream of water is obstructed by a dam, the cessation of the stream of water is observed.

original: de yod pas de med par mthong bas de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor nges pas snga ma la ltos pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yod pas de med par mthong bas de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor nges pas snga ma la ltos pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Since that is present, that is seen to be absent, and since they are ascertained to be the nature of cause and effect, they are not independent of the former.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang gsum la ltos pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang gsum la ltos pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, the other three should be understood as dependent.

original: 'di ltar sngar ma mthong ba'i me ma yin pa nye ba na du ba mthong bas me la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyis du ba yang bskyed do zhes ci'i phyir mi brtag / de lta na yang me rgyu nyid yin te bud shing bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngar ma mthong ba'i me ma yin pa nye ba na du ba mthong bas me la ltos pa gzhan nyid kyis du ba yang bskyed do zhes ci'i phyir mi brtag / de lta na yang me rgyu nyid yin te bud shing bzhin no //
translated: Even so, fire is the cause, like fuel.

original: de lta yin na gzhan yang gang 'dod pa'i bong bu la sogs pa rgyu nyid yin na /
analyzed: de lta yin na gzhan yang gang 'dod pa'i bong bu la sogs pa rgyu nyid yin na /
translated: If that were so, then other things, such as a donkey, would also be the cause of smoke.

original: de'i phyir sde yang du ba las rjes su dpag par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na /
analyzed: de'i phyir sde yang du ba las rjes su dpag par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer na /
translated: Therefore, it follows that a donkey would also be inferred from smoke.

original: de ci me rgyu nyid du nges pa de bzhin du bong bu yang yin nam //
analyzed: de ci me rgyu nyid du nges pa de bzhin du bong bu yang yin nam //
translated: Is it certain that a donkey is the cause of fire, just as fire is the cause of smoke?

original: 'on te mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag de la yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa dag de la yang 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Or is it because direct perception and non-apprehension operate in that case as well?

original: gnyi ga la yang mi rigs pa'i phyir dang // gzhan de dag dgag pa'i phyir gsum pa la brten pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang mi rigs pa'i phyir dang // gzhan de dag dgag pa'i phyir gsum pa la brten pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Because it is illogical in both cases, and because the third alternative is not based on the negation of those two,

original: 'on kyang me bsgrubs na de yang grub ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang me bsgrubs na de yang grub ba yin te /
translated: but rather when fire is established, that is also established.

original: gzhan dgag pa med pa la gnod pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan dgag pa med pa la gnod pa med pa nyid do //
translated: But the absence of a negation of another is not a reason.

original: rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there an inference,

original: rgyu nyid du ma nges pa nyid kyi @306a * //
analyzed: rgyu nyid du ma nges pa nyid kyi @306a * //
translated: because the reason is not ascertained.

original: phyir ro // me la ltos pa las nam yang bong bus byas pa yin no zhes pa'i the tshom ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyir ro // me la ltos pa las nam yang bong bus byas pa yin no zhes pa'i the tshom ni ma yin te /
translated: And the doubt, “Is it produced by a donkey, since it depends on fire?” is not,

original: nges pa dang 'gal te de ni the tshom gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa dang 'gal te de ni the tshom gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory to certainty, since it has the nature of doubt.

original: de 'gag pa yang de nyid la dpyad pas yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin pas de ltar glags tshol gyi gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'gag pa yang de nyid la dpyad pas yin gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin pas de ltar glags tshol gyi gnas ma yin no //
translated: And the cessation of that doubt is due to the analysis of that very reason, not due to another, so it is not a proper occasion for that.

original: de bzhin du me rgyu yin zhes nges par bzung ba ma rig pa'i phyir bkag pa nyid du gnas ma yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du me rgyu yin zhes nges par bzung ba ma rig pa'i phyir bkag pa nyid du gnas ma yin nam /
translated: In the same way, is it not the case that the ascertainment, “Fire is the reason,” is not a proper occasion for negation, because of the absence of the ascertainment?

original: me nyid rgyu ma yin te gzhan rgyu ma yin pa ma bkag pa'i phyir dang bud shing yang don dam par rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me nyid rgyu ma yin te gzhan rgyu ma yin pa ma bkag pa'i phyir dang bud shing yang don dam par rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not that fire itself is not the reason, because another is not negated as the reason, and because fuel is the reason ultimately.

original: rgyu nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the reason not ascertained,

original: du ba mi rtsom pa yang srid pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: du ba mi rtsom pa yang srid pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: because the non-commencement of smoke is possible.

original: brtsad par mi rigs te /
analyzed: brtsad par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not right to dispute this,

original: rnam par gcod pa gsum gyi bye brag gis 'grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa gsum gyi bye brag gis 'grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is established by the difference of the three exclusions.🔽Thus, it is said:

original: 'di ltar / tshogs la ltos nas gzhan dang ldan //
analyzed: 'di ltar / tshogs la ltos nas gzhan dang ldan //
translated: It is established by the collection, in dependence on the other.

original: rnam gcod rdzas la ltos pa yis //
analyzed: rnam gcod rdzas la ltos pa yis //
translated: By the exclusion of substance,

original: mthun pas ma 'brel rnam par gcod //
analyzed: mthun pas ma 'brel rnam par gcod //
translated: the non-connection of the similar is excluded.

original: las las shin tu rnam gcod 'grub //
analyzed: las las shin tu rnam gcod 'grub //
translated: The action is established by the complete exclusion.

original: ces bya ba smos te gang gi tshe me'i sgra des nye bar mtshon pa'i tshogs pa bsdus pa brjod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos te gang gi tshe me'i sgra des nye bar mtshon pa'i tshogs pa bsdus pa brjod pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the collection that is indicated by the word fire is mentioned,

original: de nyid kho na gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kho na gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: at that time, it is the exclusion of just that which possesses the other.

original: gang gi tshe yang me'i rdzas nyid yin pas de'i tshe yang me'i rgyu nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang me'i rdzas nyid yin pas de'i tshe yang me'i rgyu nyid ces bya ste /
translated: When it is the substance of fire, at that time it is the cause of fire.

original: gang gi tshe mthun pa yin pa de'i tshe rgyu yin te de ni ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe mthun pa yin pa de'i tshe rgyu yin te de ni ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: When it is similar, at that time it is the cause. That is the exclusion of the non-connection.

original: don bya ba byed pa nyid yin pas de'i tshe yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
analyzed: don bya ba byed pa nyid yin pas de'i tshe yang ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa yin no //
translated: When it performs the function, at that time it is the exclusion of the non-connection.

original: de yang 'di ltar bya ba'i bye brag rnam pa gsum po 'di nyid mngon sum dang mi dmigs pas nus pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar bya ba'i bye brag rnam pa gsum po 'di nyid mngon sum dang mi dmigs pas nus pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, this is established by direct perception and non-apprehension.

original: skabs 'dir shes aasdza ta'i zhal snga nas bshad pa nyid rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: skabs 'dir shes aasdza ta'i zhal snga nas bshad pa nyid rigs pa yin no //
translated: In this context, the explanation of the venerable Saṃghabhadra is correct.

original: rje btsun rnam 'grel mdzad pa nyid kyis kyang /
analyzed: rje btsun rnam 'grel mdzad pa nyid kyis kyang /
translated: The venerable author of the Pramaṇavārttika also says:

original: rdza ma lan gyis ni bum pa dang // me yis thal ba byed pa yin //
analyzed: rdza ma lan gyis ni bum pa dang // me yis thal ba byed pa yin //
translated: A pot is made by a potter, and ashes by fire.

original: mtshon sogs kyis ni rma la sogs //
analyzed: mtshon sogs kyis ni rma la sogs //
translated: A wound and so on are made by a weapon and so on.

original: gsungs pa'i dgongs pa de nyid yin //
analyzed: gsungs pa'i dgongs pa de nyid yin //
translated: This is the intended meaning of that statement.

original: 'bras bu nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir yang ji lta bu ba bzhin du thal bar gyur pa las kyang me ci'i phyir rjes su mi dpag / ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir yang ji lta bu ba bzhin du thal bar gyur pa las kyang me ci'i phyir rjes su mi dpag / ma yin te /
translated: Since there is no difference in the effect, why is fire not inferred from smoke, just as a pot is?

original: yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is accepted that it depends on place, time, and so on.

original: 'di ltar / 'bras bu'ang kha cig skye ba ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'bras bu'ang kha cig skye ba ni //
translated: Thus, some effects arise

original: tsam zhig rgyu la'ang ltos pa yin //
analyzed: tsam zhig rgyu la'ang ltos pa yin //
translated: merely depending on the cause.

original: gzhan dag rgyu ni gnas pa dang // de dag ltos par dus rig bya //
analyzed: gzhan dag rgyu ni gnas pa dang // de dag ltos par dus rig bya //
translated: Others depend on the cause remaining, and their time is known.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: That is,

original: de la bum pa dang thal ba la sogs pa skye ba kho na gzhan la ltos pa yin no //🔽de @306b nyid kyi phyir don gzhan la ltos nas rgyun chad pa las 'das pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyi rgyu yod pa nyid nges par nus kyi da ltar byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la bum pa dang thal ba la sogs pa skye ba kho na gzhan la ltos pa yin no // de @306b nyid kyi phyir don gzhan la ltos nas rgyun chad pa las 'das pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyi rgyu yod pa nyid nges par nus kyi da ltar byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: only such things as a pot and ashes depend on another for their arising.

original: 'jug pa la sogs pa gcig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa la sogs pa gcig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is possible to ascertain that the cause of a conditioned phenomenon exists because it is not beyond the scope of reason that it is dependent on another object. But it is not present because its activity does not occur at the same time.

original: phyogs gzhan la ni du ba snang ba la sogs pa gnas skabs kyi khyad par la ltos pa yin gyi /
analyzed: phyogs gzhan la ni du ba snang ba la sogs pa gnas skabs kyi khyad par la ltos pa yin gyi /
translated: In another system, the appearance of smoke and so on depends on a specific state,

original: rgyun 'gag pa gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyun 'gag pa gzhan la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it does not depend on another cessation of the continuum.

original: rgyu ma tshang na rgyun 'gag pa'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa med pa las da ltar ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: rgyu ma tshang na rgyun 'gag pa'i phyir gzhan la ltos pa med pa las da ltar ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: Since the continuum ceases when the cause is incomplete, there is no fault in saying that the present depends on another, because it is not independent.

original: de lta bu la ltos nas yang rje btsun chos mchog gis phyi ma gnyis la brten pa'i 'bad pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu la ltos nas yang rje btsun chos mchog gis phyi ma gnyis la brten pa'i 'bad pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: In dependence on that, the venerable Dharmapala says that effort that depends on the latter two is fruitful.

original: sngar nyes pa de'i tshe yang phyi ma'i cha la ni brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar nyes pa de'i tshe yang phyi ma'i cha la ni brten pa ma yin no //
translated: Previously, at the time of the fault, it was not dependent on the future part.

original: mngon sum sngon du song ba'i mi dmigs pas yin gyi /
analyzed: mngon sum sngon du song ba'i mi dmigs pas yin gyi /
translated: It is due to non-apprehension preceded by perception,

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir dang po nyid kho na mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir dang po nyid kho na mchog ces bya'o //
translated: and because it does not depend on anything else, it is called supreme from the very beginning.

original: tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig gis bsdus nas mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa rnam pa gsum sngon du 'gro bas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig gis bsdus nas mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa rnam pa gsum sngon du 'gro bas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo grub pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Having summarized it in eleven verses, it is called The Establishment of the Nature of Cause and Effect through the Precedence of the Three Types of Perception and Non-Apprehension.

original: mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na shr'i mi tra'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na shr'i mi tra'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It was composed by the great scholar Jñānaśrīmitra. It is completed.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta ku m'a ra ka la sha dang / lo ts'a ba sh'akya 'od kyi 'gyur//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta ku m'a ra ka la sha dang / lo ts'a ba sh'akya 'od kyi 'gyur//
translated: By the Indian preceptor Pandita Kumāraśrī and the translator Śākya-od.
